law.catch_line: Fees for fingerprint impressions or photograph requested for professional, trade, or commercial purposes or personal use.

text.section: The Department of Kentucky State Police may charge a fee of ten dollars ($10) per set of fingerprint impressions taken and five dollars ($5) per photograph taken or copied when those services are requested by a person for professional, trade, or commercial purposes or for personal use.

If the actual cost of processing fingerprinting and photograph requests rises above the fee amounts set in this section, the Department of Kentucky State Police may set new fees through administrative regulations.
Nothing in this section shall change any other fee allocation allowed by statute.

law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014.
